Name: Kiddywidget
Condition Immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
Traits: Unusual Nature. The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Actions: Multiattack. The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the kiddywidget (escape DC 8). Tail. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.
